statements: DELETE FROM retirement_documents WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_DATE;
DELETE FROM retirement_documents WHERE document_title = 'Retirement Plan Document';
DELETE FROM retirement_documents WHERE upload_date < '2022-01-01' AND document_type = 'Legal';
DELETE FROM RetirementDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Report' AND expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM LegalPaperwork WHERE lawyer_name = 'John Doe' AND filing_date < '2021-08-15';
DELETE FROM legal_paperwork WHERE paperwork_name = 'Financial Report';
DELETE FROM DocumentAccess WHERE document_id = 5 AND access_type = 'read';
DELETE FROM LegalPaperwork WHERE paperwork_owner = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM LegalPaperwork WHERE paperwork_name = 'Will Document' AND paperwork_type = 'Legal' AND paperwork_owner = 'John Doe';
